code: import{v4 as uuid}from"uuid";import{useFilter}from"../../../context/filter-context";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const propertyTypes=[{id:uuid(),type:"House"},{id:uuid(),type:"Guest House"},{id:uuid(),type:"Flat"},{id:uuid(),type:"Hotel"}];export const PropertyType=()=>{const{propertyType,filterDispatch}=useFilter();const handlePropertyClick=property=>{filterDispatch({type:"PROPERTY_TYPE",payload:property});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-container mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-lg font-medium",children:"Property Type"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap gap-4 mt-2",children:propertyTypes.map(_ref=>{let{id,type}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"flex items-center justify-center cursor-pointer px-4 py-2 border rounded-md transition duration-200 ease-in-out ".concat(propertyType===type?"bg-black text-white":"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-300"),onClick:()=>handlePropertyClick(type),children:type},id);})})]});};
